pages.text: A valid tank multiblock must have a square base of any dimension (eg: 2x2, 5x5) made of insulated blocks.$(br2)The multiblock can be any height, each layer must be the same size as the base and no air blocks in the center. $(br2)One of the blocks must be the tank block. Right click this with a wrench to finish the tank.

If valid, pipes will now allow connections to the tank. You can extract and insert from any where.$(br2)The capacity is the total amount of blocks x 1000l. So a 3x4x3 structure has a capacity of 48000l.
